author: IGN
description:
Ryan went on a field trip to Halo Studios and came back with hands-on impressions of Halo: Campaign Evolved, the newly announced Unreal Engine 5 remake of Halo: Combat Evolved. In this breakout from Unlocked 712, the crew discusses how the remake modernizes the original Xbox classic, what Unreal Engine 5 brings to the table, and what this means for the future of Halo on Xbox.

#Halo #Xbox #Gaming #HaloRemake
title: Halo 1 Remake Hands-On Impressions - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Obsidian’s RPGs are known for giving players a lot of choice and freedom to roleplay, and The Outer Worlds 2 is no exception. If you want to maximise your hours spent in the early game though and get some of the most impactful upgrades and weapons up front, it can be a bit hard to know where to go. That’s why we’re here to help you with this list of 11 Things To Do First in The Outer Worlds 2.

For more help with The Outer Worlds 2, check out our wiki!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/the-outer-worlds-2

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:26 - 1: Enable Adaptive Triggers (PS5)
00:39 - 2: Choice of Tutorial
01:19 - 3: Early Paradise Island Equipment
01:46 - 4: Meet Fairfield’s Leaders (Avoid Soft-lock)
02:35 - 5: Unlock Double-Jump (Spire Grove)
04:10 - 6: Unlock VALERIE’s Mod Kit
04:59 - 7: Find Euphoria ARC Pass at Ministry of Accuracy
05:40 - 8: Unlock Gas-Energy Deflection Apparatus (Overshield)
06:56 - 9: Find a Free Incendiary Shotgun
07:34 - 10: Find Lucy the Crabble (Pet #1)
08:16 - 11: Fin
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - 11 Things To Do First

author: IGN
description: Check out The Replacer 'Crime Scene' Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest addition to the first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can rest easy come launch day with The Replacer filling in while you play the latest Call of Duty. Yet, after the mission goes awry, The Replacer must be replaced by the likes of Terry Crews and Nikki Glaser. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official The Replacer 'Crime Scene' Trailer (Ft. Terry Crews)

author: IGN
description: In Pokemon Legends: Z-A, Shiny Pokemon present themselves in a different color and can sparkle. They can be extremely rare, so here are some tricks on how to find and catch Shiny Pokemon more easily!
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - How to Hunt For Shiny Pokemon

author: IGN
description:
Happy November everyone!  We are fast approaching the holiday season so we put together this video to help showcase some of the biggest games that will be available this month for you to play yourself, or maybe buy as a gift for someone you love.   From Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC to Kirby Air Riders coming to Switch 2, there is definitely something this month for everyone to enjoy!

author: IGN
description:
Jumping once? It's fine. Jumping twice? That's where it's at. Here's how to unlock the Double Jump in The Outer Worlds 2. Once you land on Paradise Island after finishing the tutorial, you can get the boots that allow you to double jump very quickly. But you should grab some things on the way to help you on your journey.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - How To Unlock Double Jump

author: IGN
description:
If you like this video and would like to see more like it, make sure to subscribe to Eurogamer on YouTube. 

Why did The Callisto Protocol fail? Despite what was promised, the final game was nowhere near the success Krafton or Striking Distance Studios thought it would be. 

From the creative mind behind Dead Space, The Callisto Protocol was released in December 2022, but what the game actually demonstrated was how little it understood about what made Dead Space successful in the first place. Zoe Delahunty-Light is still feeling some kind of way about the letdown The Callisto Protocol ended up being, so in this video essay on The Callisto Protocol, she goes into how it lacked the subtlety that something like Dead Space had in spades, and what was going on behind the scenes in The Callisto Protocol to make it a disappointing, mediocre survival horror game.
This video was created by Zoe Delahunty-Light and was originally featured on Eurogamer.

#IGN #CallistoProtocol #DeadSpace
title: I'm Still Annoyed About The Callisto Protocol

author: IGN
description:
Six years after the release of the original, The Outer Worlds 2 is shaping up to be a deeper, smarter, and more focused RPG experience. Obsidian has rebuilt nearly every system — from how you build your character to how you explore and fight across Arcadia. In this video, we’ll go over the nine biggest changes and additions from the original.

This sequel introduces a new trait-based character creation system, removes respecs to make choices matter, and expands the flaw system with unique rewards. You’ll also find brand-new throwables and tactical gadgets, fully reactive radio stations, overhauled companions and abilities, a new crafting system, and the complete removal of item durability and weight limits. Plus, players can finally experience the game in third-person mode, making The Outer Worlds 2 feel like the true next evolution of Obsidian’s sci-fi RPG.
title: The Outer Worlds 2: 9 Major Changes and Improvements Over the Original

author: IGN
description: Watch the 'Know Your Enemy' Trailer for ARC Raiders, the hit third-person action shooter franchise developed by Embark Studios. Players will face all manner of threats in the Rust Belt, big and small. From the high-flying Rocketeer, to the menacing Queen, check out the latest trailer to see what awaits to compromise the run, leaving you returning to the underground city of Speranza empty-handed. ARC Raiders is launching on October 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: ARC Raiders - Official 'Know Your Enemy' Trailer
